attributes.action: Enforce the seizure of any motorised vehicle that has modified exhaust or sub-woofers (impede the Right to Private Life when used)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motor vehicles are a by-product of modern life and serve a useful purpose for many. Some owners, however, modify their vehicles by virtue of fitting exhaust pipes ("silencers") or sub-woofers (fitted in the boot) that are subsequently driven on the streets and emit more noise than allowable.
Motor vehicles are merely machines that serve a specific purpose and impact on Private life must be proportionate: The Right is satisfied with the free availability and choice of vehicles; wilful modification (away from manufacturers design and fitting) lessen this Right in comparison to residents' Right to Private Life in houses near roads.
